name: CalmCity
description:
Welcome to Calm City.

An independently developed city builder with an infinitely generating landscape.  Encourage people to live in your city, collect taxes to fund city growth, and try to keep your bank balance in the positive!

Calm City is a relaxing city builder you can play at your own pace.  It's built on a bespoke engine, with a unique visual style, and over an hour of original soundtrack.

Please note: the only rendering option for this game is Vulkan, so please ensure your GPU and drivers support the Vulkan API before purchasing this game.
